dcterms:creator: G. Mehr
A. Eskandarian
dcterms:description: A dataset containing traffic data from a segment of the I-81 interstate highway, used to estimate the probability that a vehicle can successfully perform one or multiple lane changes to reach a near-term goal state.
dcterms:title: I-81 interstate highway segment

dcterms:creator: G. Mehr
A. Eskandarian
dcterms:description: Traffic simulation data generated using VISSIM® to evaluate the performance of an advance warning system for lane drops.
dcterms:title: VISSIM® traffic simulations

dcterms:creator: Traffic Engineering Division
dcterms:description: A manual providing guidelines for traffic operations and safety analysis, used to inform the simulation setup and parameters.
dcterms:title: Virginia Department of Transportation (VDOT) Traffic Operations and Safety Analysis Manual (TOSAM)

dcterms:creator: Traffic Engineering Division
dcterms:description: A user guide for VISSIM® software, detailing how to use the software for traffic simulations.
dcterms:title: VDOT VISSIM User Guide

dcterms:creator: Virginia Commonwealth Transportation Board
dcterms:description: Historical flow data used to inform traffic conditions and parameters for simulations.
dcterms:title: Historical flow data

dcterms:creator: Virginia Department of Transportation
Kimley-Horn
dcterms:description: Study data from VDOT and Kimley-Horn, including VISUM and VISSIM results and calibration data.
dcterms:title: VDOT and Kimley-Horn study data
